ygData.subject: Re: Stilleto of the Bloodclaw
ygData.msgSnippet: ahhh.  that s pretty cool, didn t know.
ygData.messageBody:
ahhh. that's pretty cool, didn't know.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: J.M. Capozzi [mailto:croak63@...]
> Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 11:39 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Stilleto of the Bloodclaw
>
>
> From: "J.M. Capozzi" <croak63@...>
>
> It's a DoT effect. 20 points on the initial proc, and 20
> points for two
> ticks after, for 60 extra damage, total.
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 12:20 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Stilleto of the Bloodclaw
>
>
> >From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> >i believe it is a life tap, takes health from what you are
> attacking and
> >gives it to you. not sure how many hp it takes.
> >
> >Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> >
> >
> >> -----Original Message-----
> >> From: John Robertson [mailto:johnr@...]
> >> Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 8:50 AM
> >> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >> Subject: [eqbards] Stilleto of the Bloodclaw
> >>
> >>
> >> From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
> >>
> >> Hello all. This isn't bard related, but I was wondering
> if any of you
> >> know what the "blood claw" effect of the Stilleto is? We
> grabbed one
> >> last night. Thanks.
> >>
> >> Jyzan
